Package org.baswell.httproxy

Interface Summary
IOProxyDirector A ProxyDirector for blocking IO.
NIOProxyDirector A ProxyDirector for non-blocking IO.
ProxyDirector Base interface for receiving proxy events and manipulating request & response headers.
ProxyLogger Bridge between your logging library and the HttProxy runtime.
 

Class Summary
ConnectionParameters Describes the connection parameters to a proxied server.
HttpCookie An HTTP cookie.
HttpHeader An HTTP header.
HttpMessage Base class for HttpRequest and HttpResponse.
HttpRequest A proxied HTTP request.
HttpResponse A proxied HTTP response.
ServerSocketAcceptLoop Accepts and dispatches incoming requests on the given ServerSocket.
ServerSocketChannelAcceptLoop Accepts and dispatches incoming requests on the given ServerSocketChannel.
SimpleIODirector A simple IOProxyDirector that proxies to a single server and prints out proxy events.
SimpleNIOProxyDirector A simple NIOProxyDirector that proxies to a single server and prints out proxy events.
SimpleProxyDirector A simple ProxyDirector that proxies to a single server and prints out proxy events.
SimpleProxyLogger A ProxyLogger implementation that logs everything to System.out or System.err.
SLF4JProxyLogger SLF4J logger bridge for the HttProxy runtime.
 

Exception Summary
EndProxiedRequestException When thrown from ProxyDirector.onRequestStart(HttpRequest) methods the response code will be returned to the client and the connection closed.
